channel.title: Som1 please try to help
channel.description:
figure out vengece.
ss: my ss spec works, hits twice, does correct emote (ice barrage emote) but i just need to know how to change GFX from splashing effect of exploding pest control mosnter to sara strike lightning. please som1 i really need this. lol

item.title: Som1 please try to help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Just edit the gfx that is created in your special attack method. It might be something like this,

stillgfx(#, EnemyY, EnemyX);

Read full topic
